title: Data-Driven Collaborative Programming Modeling Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic programming syntax and experience in designing simple algorithms
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based VR simulation tools with emphasis on collaborative projects among peer learners

learning_goals: Learners can design programming models using real scientific data.
Learners can explain the process of solving modeling problems through collaboration with peers.
Learners can evaluate stages from data collection to interpretation and propose effective solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
